meanings.sent1: She held an antispeculative view on investing, preferring safe options.
meanings.sent2: The company's decision to avoid risky investments was antispeculative.
meanings.sent3: It was quite amusing to see his antispeculative approach to gambling pay off.
meanings.sent4: Her antispeculative nature was like a shield against financial risks.
meanings.sent5: The antispeculative strategy proved to be the most prudent in the long run.

meanings.definition: Not engaging in or based on speculation.
meanings.sent1: Their antispeculative business model focused on concrete data rather than guesses.
meanings.sent2: The antispeculative report relied solely on factual evidence.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to watch the antispeculative team outperform the speculative ones.
meanings.sent4: His antispeculative mindset was a breath of fresh air in the world of finance.
meanings.sent5: The antispeculative approach led to consistent and reliable results.
